title: Dominion (Make a comment here)
body:
Hello Rioters, 

I believe Dominion should become a game mode in OCE
1. OCE has enough players to make Dominion still a relatively short queue time
2. There would be plenty of people playing it, because who doesn't like capture the flag once in a while?

Dominion should become a gamemode like that of Twisted Treeline in the sense that it is up every so often, because otherwise it would be stomped by normals/ranked as a standardised gamemode. Making Dominion a period based gamemode would increase gameplay, and would also enable a wider audience to enjoy League of Legends as a game as a whole. 

Please make Dominion an actual gamemode in OCE

Comment what you guys think, and also Vote in which position you stand.
